page.title: 08PRESTON NORTH END F.C.
page.content: We are great supporters of Preston North End Football Club. Our names are Farouk and Sajid and we live in the Deepdale area of Preston, quite near to the football ground. We are proud of our club which has played good football since 1881. They were the first club to win not only the F.A. Cup, but also the the League Championship in the same year, 1889. In the 1950's they had a good international player called Tom Finney who is now President of the club. Today, however, Preston are struggling. They are in the Fourth Division this season for the first time in their history.
